thread.title: Hy-Vee Aisles Online Launches With Success
thread.title_full: Hy-Vee Aisles Online Launches With Success

title: Hy-Vee Aisles Online Launches With Success
text:
Hy-Vee Aisles Online Launches With Success October 21, 2015, 5:02 PM by Hailey Higgins SIOUX FALLS, SD - 
In the weeks since launching, the new Hy-Vee home delivery service is seeing success in South Dakota's largest city. 
Anyone in Sioux Falls can log on and pick out everything they need from a digital aisle and pick up at the store or have their groceries delivered. Hy-Vee rolled out Aisles Online in September after finding success in Des Moines. An online form allows customers to either set up a delivery or arrange a pick up time at the store. 
Working much like the baggage system at an airport, everything is tracked electronically. 
"It's going really well. A lot of great comments only going to continue to go well," Store Director Deb Riedel said. 
After a couple weeks of test runs, Riedel says demand is quickly growing."Our customers love it. We have return orders coming through so they've used it before and they want to come back and do it again," Riedel said. 
The new delivery service costs around $5 for delivery or $3 for pick up. 
The service is free for any order over $100. Â© 2015 KELOLAND TV. All Rights Reserved.
